item.title: EP 830 - It Screams Your Name From Darkened Caves
item.itunes:title: It Screams Your Name From Darkened Caves
item.description:
Today we meet a serial killer who swears he only killed once, and then we travel to a mountain either blessed by God or cursed by aliens!

 

Fan Art Friday artwork by Manpleet!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

MONSTER SNARED Ex-cop arrested over ‘serial killer’ murder of girl, 8, found dismembered on street but denies slaying SEVEN more kids

https://www.the-sun.com/news/3546288/ex-cop-arrested-murder-girl-denies-more-kids/

The Mysterious Montserrat Mountain of Spain

https://bizarreandgrotesque.com/2016/04/08/the-mysterious-montserrat-mountain/

Monistrol de Montserrat

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monistrol_de_Montserrat

 

 

Virgin of Montserrat

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virgin_of_Montserrat

MONTSERRAT, THE MOUNTAIN OF THE THIRD MILLENNIUM

https://iniciacionamontserrat.es/2013/05/21/montserrat-la-montana-del-tercer-milenio/

Strange Disappearances in the Mountain of Montserrat in Catalonia, Spain.

https://labitacoradelmiedo.wordpress.com/2014/09/24/extranas-desapariciones-en-la-montana-de-montserrat-en-cataluna-espana/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Simple

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

Youtube Champ Stewart Meatball

The Haunted Mic Arm provided by Chyme Chili

Thanks to Fabio N!

Hood River, OR 97031

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
